import React from 'react' const Register = () => { return (

{errMsg}

Register

setUser(e.target.value)} required aria-invalid={validName ? "false" : "true"} // aria-decribedby="uidnote"//the requirements needed onFocus={() => setUserFocus(true)} onBlur={() => setUserFocus(false)} />

3 to 23 characters.
Must begin with a letter.
Letters, numbers, underscores, hypens allowed.

) } export default Register
